title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This chart shows the Average Time Social of Media Daily by Age Group .
\\n You can see that the Average Time Social are in the 35 - 44 and 25 - 34 Age groups .
The most Time Social are in the 45 - 54 Age Group and they use Media Daily twice as much the Average Time Social .
gold: This chart shows the average time spent in minutes on Social media daily in Maputo by age group . From the chart , we see that people around 15 - 24 spend 124 minutes daily on social media , followed by people around 25 - 34 spend around 72 minutes . People in the age group 35 - 44 are the lowest amount of people that spend 70 minutes on social media .
